snippet: A growing cadre of what are known as lone soldiers are leaving their countries to become infantrymen, intelligence officers, paratroopers and pilots in the Israeli military.
abstract: Growing cadre of what are known as lone soldiers are leaving homelands around the world to become infantrymen, intelligence officers, paratroopers and pilots in the Israeli military.
lead_paragraph: A growing cadre of what are known as lone soldiers are leaving their countries to become infantrymen, intelligence officers, paratroopers and pilots in the Israeli military.

headline.seo: ‘Lone Soldiers’ Arrive in Israel to Serve in Its Military
headline.main: Enlisting From Afar for the Love of Israel
headline.print_headline: Enlisting From Afar For the Love Of Israel
